newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: FOREIGNERS SELL 68.81 MLN RAND S.AFRICA BONDS WED.
newsitem.headline: FOREIGNERS SELL 68.81 MLN RAND S.AFRICA BONDS WED.

text.p: Foreigners sold 68.81 million rands worth of South African bonds on Wednesday after buying a net 324.38 million rands worth on Tuesday, the Bond Exchange said.
